name: Piggies World
about:
The first hand drawn PFP collection on Bitcoin with Taproot.

Piggies World is a hand drawn collection where every country on earth has its own unique piggy in its stereotypical way.
how-to-buy: You can buy it safely through auctions on our discord server. You could also buy it on our discord server from the secondary sale. The OTC deals will be executed on your own private channel on our discord server. And in future our collection will be available on trusted marketplaces.
value-proposiion:
The collection has a unique idea with original art that has never been seen before on any blockchain.
All of the piggies are hand drawn form our Artist Vito. It took him more than 300 hours. 
All Piggies are within the first 2000 Ordinals minted.
mint-status: 88 PIGGIES are still available to purchase through auctions on our discord server.
